item.description:
In the days before television and the internet, people gathered in the parlor (living room) for interesting conversation.  Imagine that! Well, sounds great to me! Actually, we've attended and had other evenings like this, and they are always wonderful.  I just love getting together with like-minded folks and good discussions.

Join us in our living room "parlor" for some social and learning time as we all enjoy a pizza dinner and stimulating discussions.

Bring your law of attraction success stories and tons of law of attraction and spirituality questions, and we'll share in our group wisdom. Who knows what delightful surprises we'll end up with!  Can you come?

PLEASE be considerate of your host (me and Mark), and honor your "yes" rsvp by either showing up or letting us know if your plans change by changing your rsvp. I'll be planning the food for dinner according to the RSVP's. Many of you have been wonderful about this, and we very much appreciate your understanding, consideration and support! Thank you!

Also, please refer to our parking instructions on our files page, third one down. Click here: parking instructions .

Looking forward to co-creating with you!

Ann and Mark
item.how_to_find_us: We're down a long driveway. Look for white mailbox with our name and #276, across from large, old, white house

group.name: "Good Vibrations" Metro West Law of Attraction Community

item.name: Pizza and Parlor night
